src_original: atosti kiñcit sarvvatra na duḥkhādvalamantaram // 34 //  2.10. kālo yathā yathā yāti duḥkhavṛddhistatha tathā /  tasmāt kaḍevarasyāsya paravadṛśyate sukham // 35 //
2.7. śarīraṃ sucireṇāpi sukhasya svaṃ na jāyate /
pareṇābhibhavo nāma svabhāvasya na yujyate // 32 //  2.8. agrayāṇāṃ mānasaṃ duḥkhamitareṣāṃ śarīrajam /
duḥkhadvayena lokoyamahanyahani hanyate // 33 //  2.9. kalpanāyāḥ sukhaṃ vaśyaṃ vaśyādduḥkhasya kalpanā /
